original: 逐鹿中原，除秣馬厲兵，若能掌握財源，定可事半功倍！在下善於經商，不知大人是否願資助在下三千金錢？
text: Competing in the Central Plains, apart from horses and soldiers, if you can control the financial resources, you will get twice the result with half the effort! I am good at doing business. I wonder if the adults are willing to subsidize the next 3000 dollars?
